fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Check if a player's role has a 2 in it. If it doesn't, they gain your wincon and are notified. If it does, you deal a Basic attack to them.
- Die. If all roles with the number 2 are dead after this, you win and the game ends. Otherwise, the game continues.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On night 2, this role cannot use any abilities.
- All roles with the number 2 in them are notified this role is in the game.
- You can still win the game after death, winning with the winning faction.
- Players with your wincon lost it upon your death.
- If any roles with **Mario** in their name are rolled, they must be killed to win as well.
